items.sentence: Tom has been absent from work for three days.
Tom wanted Mary to cook him something to eat.
I'm sure Tom wouldn't mind if you left early.
Tom picked up the knife and peeled the apple.
Tom asked for my permission to use the phone.
Tom will be back in less than thirty minutes.
Tom's mother told him to go get his hair cut.
It would be better if we didn't speak of Tom.
Apparently, Tom didn't notice anything wrong.
The important thing right now is to find Tom.
